start:
Hi {},  Welcome to the Enterprise A HR chatbot.
If you are sure you are registered in the bot, click the “Authenticate”.
Otherwise, contact to admin.
reset:
Hi {},  Welcome to the Enterprise A HR chatbot.
If you are sure you are registered in the bot, click the “Authenticate”.
Otherwise, contact to admin.

Authenticate.Fail:
I'm sorry, No users were found with your information.
Please contact to admin.

Help:
Hi {}! 🌷

💡 You can make a report, by:
Home 👉 Make a Report 👉 [selecting report section] 👉 [select report] 👉 [filter parameter of report]

💡 You can see your past reports, by:
Home 👉 Reports List 👉 [filter List by date]

💡 You can see your profile and change it, by:
Home 👉 Profile 👉 Change Profile 👉 [changing item you allowed]

💡 You can go settings ⚙ and see About, Help and Support, by:
Home 👉 settings

If there’s a question click “Support” and send a ticket to us. 🙏
About:
This bot was  born to make a report for business intelligence.
You will be able to customize it too.
Version 1.0.0
New_Ticket: Please send your question or suggestion. 🙏
Change_Profile:
You can change your First Name and LastName.
For changing Phone Number or Job Position click “Support” and send a ticket to us.
